channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bags dumped outside houses 16 and 14 Foulden Road overnight., 4th August
item.description:
I am a resident and have noticed several lots of litter and fly tipping in this road and nearby roads please check and remove, this could be a hinderence to pedestrians as it is close to bikes locked on post.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Foulden Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Van rear light smashed by council recycling collectors, 4th August
item.description:
Urgent - Reporting damage caused to my van Weds 30th July at 8.55am. When dragging up a bin up the curb behind our van, a bin hit and smashed the rear light. Worker in person kindly left a note, appreciated. Attached photos.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): King Edwards Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Damaged road & pavement, 4th August
item.description:
(Breguet 10 New Bond St)We have just spent 200k on re-tanking the basement and during the heavy rainfall in July we had water ingress in the basement which is under the pavement & road. Van Cleef also had water ingress, their basement is adjacent to ours. Maybe there is a cracked drain or the damage to the road and pavement is allowing heavy water to seep to our basements
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 168, New Bond Street, Mayfair, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 198 PDSA Charity shop, Kilburn High Road, NW6 4JD, 4th August
item.description:
Elderly man tripped and fell at 10.15am this morning on his way to the dentist next door to 198 Kilburn High Road. He tripped over an electrical cable coming out of a square cover on the foot path. The cable is lose and he got his foot stuck in it. The cable then travels up the wall of 198 Kilburn High Road. It’s very dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 196, Kilburn High Road, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet
